Classes in net.joala.condition used by net.joala.condition

          Specialized condition for boolean states (true/false).
Condition

           Interface for factories providing conditions.
DefaultBooleanCondition
           
DefaultCondition
           An abstract implementation for conditions.
Expression
          An expression is handed over to conditions to be evaluated again and again.
FailSafeCondition
          Condition which ensures that a runnable is executed after the condition has been performed.
Timeout
           A timeout which can be converted to different time-units.
